name: ibib

body.origin:
|- wb(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, wb(w0, w1)))
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, wb(w0, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, wb(w0, w1)))
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, wb(w0, w1)))

comment: Implication in terms of implication and biconditional. (Contributed by NM, 31-Mar-1994.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 24-Jan-2013.)
